name: Russian Policeman and Madness
description:
English subtitles and Russian voice acting.

Welcome to the page of this game. I hope you will experience different emotions after completing the game.

During the game, you will completely immerse yourself in that terrible day for the police officer Maxim Ivanov. There is no ECS button for this in the game.

You have to complete small puzzles with a search for objects, while reading the notes of the mistress of this house. With all this, the ending is ambiguous.

! INFORMATION FOR THOSE WHO HAVE ALREADY PLAYED THE GAME!

If you liked the game, but think that there are some flaws, then leave your opinion in the comments, this is important for me.I would be glad to receive any support from you. If I see your great support, I will make a really long and interesting horror game with several episodes and interesting gameplay. I will publish it on STEAM and ITCH. In this case, the level of quality of the game will be much higher. Thanks everyone :)!
